colour.models.dataset.pal_secam_rgb Module¶

Pal/Secam RGB Colourspace¶

Defines the Pal/Secam RGB colourspace:

  • PAL_SECAM_RGB_COLOURSPACE.

See also

RGB Colourspaces IPython Notebook

References

[1]International Telecommunication Union. (1998). CONVENTIONAL TELEVISION SYSTEMS. In Recommendation ITU-R BT.470-6 (pp. 1–36). Retrieved from http://www.itu.int/dms_pubrec/itu-r/rec/bt/R-REC-BT.470-6-199811-S!!PDF-E.pdf
colour.models.dataset.pal_secam_rgb.PAL_SECAM_RGB_PRIMARIES = array([[ 0.64, 0.33], [ 0.29, 0.6 ], [ 0.15, 0.06]])¶

Pal/Secam RGB colourspace primaries.

PAL_SECAM_RGB_PRIMARIES : ndarray, (3, 2)
